episodes.title: MLM Cult Forever Living Wants YOU to Pay to Work for Them
episodes.description:
#foreverliving  
#mlmexposed  
#antimlm 

Forever Living, one of the most well-known MLMs in the world, is now charging its distributors a $3 monthly fee just to access their back office and run their so-called "business." In this video, I break down what this fee means, why it's problematic, and how it's yet another example of MLM companies profiting off their own members rather than actual product sales.

This is a classic move used by multi-level marketing schemes to squeeze money from their downlines under the guise of "business tools." But is it ethical? Is it even legal? And how does it reflect on the overall MLM business model?

Let’s talk about it.

👉 Don’t forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more deep dives on scams, cults, and MLM exploitation.
